notes.txtTitle: Can you tell me about yourself?
notes.txtDetail: First of all thank you very much for inviting me here. you can call me noel. I would describe my self as hardworking employee and somebody that has already the skills and quality to match the job description. I believe i am high achiever and I always have receive a positive feedback from my seniors and my clients and If you hire me I will be the type of worker who will always go above and  beyond what is expected in my work I will always embrace change positively and

notes.txtTitle: Why do you want this job?
notes.txtDetail: I want this job because im passionate about this type of work. I spent a lot of time at work and I want that time to spent doing something i love. I also do research about your company

My greatest strength includes my fast pace of work, high standard, creativity, flexibility and how i take ownership of challenges and problems. These strength i believe will enable me to add real value to your team.

My biggest weakness is im not good at delegating tasks. I like to do things myself but i understand this is not conducive to getting things done quickly. I am mindful of my weakness, and taking action to improve.

My greatest achievement was in my last position when i helped my teammate to launch a new site for a new customer. We achieve this success by working together as a team, utilizing each other's strength
i am motivated by being fit and healthy, doing a great job to my employer because this gives me satisfaction, continuous improvement and growth, and support my family
